pages.title: Just Chill Out
pages.text: But you don't have to grind for good gear all the time!$(br)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/brewin-and-chewin)Brewin' and Chewin'$() which is an addon to the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/farmers-delight)Farmers Delight$() mod adds a few new foods and drinks that will help you "relax" (in game of course). You can brew different types of alchohol using a keg which in return will grant you buffs (or debuffs depending on what kind of abomination you make).$(br)You can also make a pizza, hamburger and a few other fun foods to use as quick saturation.$(br)$(br)$(imp)You can always celebrate the defeat of the ender dragon with a bottle of whiskey!$()

pages.title: Hamsters
pages.text: Alternatively, just find a tame a $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/hamsters)hamster$()! You can find them in most flat plains-based biomes. Breed or tame them with any type of seeds and they will follow you around. You can shift-right click on them to pick them up (literally, as an inventory item) collect them. You can make a hamster wheel to keep them entertained! There isn't much more to them but there are other interesting animals to find and tame in the modpack.
